>>pactices, but when the tests are in a separate
>>class, tests don't get updated/created.


You can find classes that are not fully tested even with the tests 
inside the class
You can find classes that are fully tested with tests outside the class

and vice-versa.

But if you only want to see the negative side of everything, it's your 
choice (if something can go wrong, it will...).

-Vladimir
